scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && concurrently -n frontend,functions -c blue,green "vite" "firebase emulators:start --only functions"
scripts.kill-ports: lsof -ti:5001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:4000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:4400 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:4500 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:9299 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:9499 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; true
